page.title: 09St.Dominick Post Office
page.content: The{Post Office}, which also serves as the village{shop}, was established in the early part of this century. The present owner took over the busines in 1966. The{mail}is collected twice daily at 0700 and 1615 on weekdays, and once on Saturdays. The premises are open from 0900 to 2100 hrs with an hour for lunch from 1230 to 1330. The owner, Mrs N.Martin employs one full-time and two part-time assistants. She does not agree with the present trend to open on{Sundays}. Nearly all her customers are from St.Dominick
